评论详情: Purchased for a special event fits great love the length and jacket. Comfortable fit!
I brought this for myself and it was a perfect fit
I was gonna wear it at a formal birthday party, but I really don’t think I’m gonna wear it!
Fit is perfect.  I bought my usual size.  Color as pictured.  Really like optional jacket
Beautiful dress, just as described. Fast shipping.
I needed a one-time outfit and this was great.  The sizing is true and very comfortable.  Better quality than I had expected.

评论概述: I love this dress. It’s perfect!
评论详情: This dress is perfect! It looks good and fits just right!
Was very pleased with the dress, I wore it for my sons wedding and received many compliments. It fit well and was very comfortable.
This was suppose to be a 2 piece dress to wear at grandsons wedding. I did not get the jacket to the dress. I only got the dress. I can't wear it to the wedding without the top coverup.

The set is ok, I little tight through the top and I sized up. It doesn’t stretch much. The lining is what is tight. I can still wear it because of the layers. It doesn’t look bad. The dress covers my knees, the jacket is longer. It is red, but an orange based red. I haven’t decided if I will wear it to the party I bought it for or send it back.

Right-sized, excellent quality for the money, packaging wrinkles steamed out easily, lilac color matches product image perfectly. Being 5’2, the dress is tea length, which will be suitable for attending an evening wedding event.
Worth the money.

I love the way the fabric feels. It's so lightweight and free flowing which makes me feel so pretty in it. It also has a nice design. The jacket fits so seamlessly with the dress and the dress has a cute little design around the neck. I love wearing this dress!

i am not one to wear dresses much but i needed one for my daughters wedding. this dress fit true to size and was very comfortable. i liked the way it fit and i was very comfortable in it. the only thing i will say is it wrinkles easily but if you have a steamer that works great!!!

评论概述: Couldn't like the dress. Too loose and color not to my liking
评论详情: As above!
It was well made. Going to wear to sons wedding
The cut of the layers accent the mid section making one appear larger. Not a good dress for a short plus size person.
i wore the dress to my grandsons wedding. It was perfect. Size was true ! Color match was spot on. Thank you
Was grandmother of bride. Beautiful dress but very hard to get wrinkles out. Ironed on first day and then again next. Got most of them out.  Fit well, pretty color.

Very nice elegant dress for wedding, a little snug across the shoulders so I was glad I upsized, easy to care for material that flatters due to being very flowy, adequate coverage of material no slip needed. Comfortable to wear as well.

Beautiful dress very disappointed ordered my size by the measurements it was too small (22). Went to a 24 was excited to wear to my granddaughter’s wedding and it was smaller than the 22. Could not even zipper it.
Loved it and it fit
Very reasonable price, steamed up nicely and my 85 year old Mom loved it! Comfortable and flattering even in her wheelchair!

I just love Hanna Nikole clothes. They fit a curvaceous figure elegantly, and they feel great while wearing. This dress and jacket combo is vibrant, just as the pictures show in the ad. I attend a lot of formal events where a "wedding" style attire is necessary. My go-to dresses and pants suits are from Hanna Nikole. I also receive a lot of compliments.

This dress fits true to size and is a pretty light blue. The material is very flowing, and it has a nice decorative neckline. I like that it has a little thin jacket to put over if you want to cover your shoulders.
This dress is very flattering on my niece! It is comfortable and classy! True to size!!

评论概述: Didn’t wear the dress, it was to short for me but a beautiful dress
评论详情: It was too short for me. I’m 74 years old and when I tried it on, it came just a little tiny bit below my knees, so I had to get a longer dress because it was for a wedding, but I’ll be returning this one. It’s a beautiful dress, but just too short.
It is flattering and looks nice But know the sleeves are sheer. I wasn’t wanting sheer sleeves.

评论概述: I'm very happy with this dress!
评论详情: I wasn't real sure about thus dress,  I liked the way it looks in some of the advertisement pics, then not so much in others, after receiving and wearing the dress, it was really comfortable,  fit great, and loved the look!
Fits like a tent... too big for my short stature.  Had to return.

This is a classy, super flattering dress!  I'm 5'2, 144 pounds.  Although arm holes hang a bit low, it's comfortable in the waist and the layers hide a multitude of sins.  It hangs a few inches below knees which  can definitely be worn for a black tie optional  affair which was the original reason for the purchase.  However, without the cover up, it totally works as a Gatsby dress with long black gloves, headpiece, and long pearls which I will wear to a business "Halloween" mixer.

It is very flattering. Hides what you don’t want seen. It is true to size. I’m 5’4” and it’s just below my knees. This is what I was looking for.  Light weight. I get too hot with multiple layers.  I like having a jacket to cover my arms if in a cooler room.  Arm holes were roomy and did not pinch or pull.
Beautiful outfit for that special.occasion. Sleeveless dress is lightweight and has a jeweled collar. Lightweight  coat cover-up goes on top. I loved the light blue color I ordered.
Nice weight to the fabric and nice drape.

This is a nice dress but it is not sized correctly.  I ordered a size bigger and it was still too small in the bust area.  Very tight around the bust and too large in the arms.  The jacket is nice, it does cover the dress completely but I can't wear the dress.

I recently tried the Hanna Nikole Women’s Plus Size Dress with Jacket, and it’s truly stunning! The flowy fabric is both comfortable and flattering, while the navy blue color adds a touch of sophistication. The two-piece design, complete with a chic jacket, makes it ideal for weddings or as a Mother of the Bride dress. The fit is perfect for size 16+, and it’s a fantastic choice for anyone looking to look effortlessly elegant.
I ordered a size to big, and I did not have enough time to return it and receive a new one for daughters wedding! Would definitely buy it again if I needed one again.
Material too thin

The two-piece dress, although labeled as rose red, actually has a lovely salmon pink hue that adds a fresh twist to its look. The criss-cross design at the front is flattering and enhances the overall silhouette, while the fabric is soft and flowy, providing both comfort and elegance. It’s a very pretty dress that combines style with a touch of sophistication, making it a great choice for various occasions.

评论概述: Arms on the jacket are skin tight and the material has no stretch or give to it to make it wearable
评论详情: With a retail price of seventy bucks, this is a lovely dress, but definitely not for me.  My hips are wider than my bust, so I had to go with the 24 in hopes it would fit. And while the underdress does fit me just fine, the way it's cut and with the overlay it makes my hips look even bigger and my chest looks even smaller. It's still a really cute dress, but not flattering on me at all. If the dress had been green i would have looked like a Christmas tree.  The jacket makes it look much more flattering, but the arms are so tight I was barely able to get them all the way up. Even when I did, I couldn't move my arms for fear of ripping out the seams, especially on such gauzy material.  While the material looks soft and flowy, it's actually a little scratchy, especially the jacket which doesn't have the nice slip-like material inside it like the dress does.  The dress looks lovely and seems well sewn, with attention to detail, but the fit is just terrible, especially on me. I suspect someone with a more classic hourglass shape rather than a pear shape would make it look much better.
Nice dress.but to tight on the bust area.  Did return.

评论概述: a lovely dress for special occasions
评论详情: i bought this dress set for my cousin's wedding, and i must say it was a good choice. here’s what i think:  advantages:  the fabric feel nice, lightweight and soft on my skin. the jacket really hides my tummy and the flowy style make me look slimmer. sequins on the neck add a touch of sparkle, not too much, just enough to feel fancy. it's perfect for formal events like weddings or even fancy dinners. cons:  the size runs a bit large, so i had to adjust it at the tailor. it arrived with some wrinkles, so you need to iron it before wearing. zipper was a little hard to pull up, maybe need some oil or something. overall, the dress make me feel elegant and confident at the wedding. i think it’s a good pick for any special occasion, just make sure you check the size carefully.

This 2-piece plus-size dress set is perfect for wedding guests, mothers of the bride, or any special occasion where you want to feel elegant and comfortable. The flowy dress offers a flattering silhouette that drapes beautifully over curves, while the coordinating jacket adds a touch of sophistication and coverage. The vibrant rose red color exudes confidence and style, making it an eye-catching choice for formal events. The dress is designed with comfort in mind, featuring soft, breathable fabric and an easy-to-wear fit. Whether you’re dancing the night away or attending a daytime ceremony, this set ensures you look polished and feel at ease.

评论概述: Dres is great!! No instruction's on how to clean it.
评论详情: Love the dress, but it did wrinkle very bad. Took it on cruise and it was very wrinkly. It is a great dress, love it. I need info on how to clean it, wash or dry cleaners?

评论概述: The Size Runs A Bit Large
评论详情: This royal blue 2-piece Chiffon dress and jacket are lovely. They are perfect for more formal events such as weddings. The dress is a good selection for plus-sized women who want comfort and style. The beaded neckline adds elegance to the dress. I typically wear a size 16 in dresses; however, this one was a bit loose on me. I recommend that anyone interested, review the Size Chart and purchase the size closest to your measurements rather than your actual dress size.

评论概述: Beautiful, well-made, light weight and elegant dress!
评论详情: I find this dress to be very comfortable to wear. It is soft and I love how it flows. It is a sophisticated look and fits true to size, with plenty of room in the bust and hips. The dress is sewn/stitched well and it irons out easily with a steamer.  An awesome dress for the price.

I ordered the Hanna Nikole Plus Size Dress in a size 18plus and color rose red and this is a very nice and well fitting dress.  The length of the dress drops to below my knees and I am 5'7".  The sizing of this 2 piece jacket dress is appropriate.  I ordered my regular size and this dress fits really good.  The dress is designed in a layered look and is embellished at the top with sequins  and the bottom portion is also gently layered.  And, a long flowing jacket completes the look of the dress.  The color rose red is really a different and very beautiful shade that reminds me of a soft red plus a rust and is hard to describe, but it looks just like it is pictured.  I love this dress and easily rate it a 5 out of 5.
Absolutely love this flowy dress it's very good quality and well made fits true to size absolutely comfortable it was a good value for the price when I received it.
I was skeptical about this dress. But it is beautiful! I love the flair and material. It is cut a little small - I got a size larger than I typically buy and it’s a little tight.

I’ve gotten a few pieces from this brand now and most of them have been easily 5 stars. This dress is cute but it’s not my favorite of the ones I’ve gotten from the brand and it also seams to be a cheaper material than the others even though the price point is the highest. Especially the Shaw like part, it’s very thin and cheap feeling. But it does looks cute with the dress overall. And the dress is flattering on my plus sized body since I’m not pear shaped. If you do have that classic pear shape where your tony on the top and then have a big bottom and hips I would say skip this because that overlay won’t do you any favors. But if your like me and Cary weight in your stomach and upper body as well then this is quite flattering. Overalll not bad, but also not my favorite.
This dress is very elegant and it is perfect for weddings and church gatherings. Very lovely

I have been looking for. Dress to wear to my aunt anniversary and this dress is absolutely perfect. The fit is great, I ordered my normal size, the dress hugs you in all the right places. I love the draping that. Overs up my problem areas. It also comes with a light weight cape, this is just a perfect dress and the color is a beautiful blue. I would definitely recommend, well constructed and quality materials were used, It was very wrinkled but I steamed the dress and it is perfect.
I love the set, but t's a little matronly! The sequins seem a little over the top but it's a nice set for and older woman. The fit is perfect.
pretty design good construction good material soft flow good fit beautiful color i would recommend

Reviewing Hanna Nikole Womens Plus Size Dress with Jacket, This is a nice, comfortable dress. It’s not high quality or luxury, since it’s almost all Polyester, but it is a loose fit, comes with a jacket that is more like a large shawl with armholes that you can take off and has a beautiful neckline. It’s very flowy. I ordered the Light Blue, and it is true to color. I really like it!

评论概述: Wonderful material, comfortable fit, and elegant jacket
评论详情: I love this material, and the fit was perfect, as well. But I especially love the style of this dress. It's very attractive, and ultra elegant. Love it!

My new dress is wonderfully flowy just as the picture shows.  At first I had a hard time zipping up the dress but it was stuck on some of the flowy fabric getting caught in the zipper. I found that the dress was just a tad bit tight in the upper middle part. This fabric is also kind of warm for me. I have to wait till winter to see how warm it remains.  I love the color and how lightweight it is. The fabric is made of a polyester chiffon .  I recommend this pretty dress.

What is there not to like about this stress? First, this is a perfect dress for an outside wedding or a summertime wedding because it is so light and airy it will keep you cool. It is a two-piece so you can take that cover-up off and wear it as a sleeveless dress. The dress fits as expected, I did not wash it before I Wore it. This will be a perfect dress for Church or for a wedding. I did not have any problems with any unraveling of strings, so it was made very well. I think it is a great price.

评论概述: Love it, but ordered too big!
评论详情: Well made, quick shipping!  Love the dress but I ordered too big, will return to get it smaller!  I ordered 22 W and it was big so will try 20 or even 18 W!

评论概述: Was pleasantly surprised by the look of this dress
评论详情: I am usually fairly skeptical about clothing purchased online. Usually, the fit isn't right or the image isn't the same as the actual product. But this dress is really nice! For anyone with a plus sized body, this is very flattering. It has a top portion that is a cross cut look across the mid section. This is great for drawing the eye away from the tummy area.  The inner lining is soft and comfortable and the outer lining is a sheer material. Overall the dress hangs very nicely and has wonderful movement. The neckline has a sequin-like adornment which gives the dress a more formal look. The dress is sleeveless but it comes with a sheer jacket as well. If you're wearing this to a wedding, it will be great to have the ability to take the jacket off if you get warm.  Lovely dress and so glad I purchased. Well worth the price and I finally have a black dress I can keep in the closet for any nice occasion.
Wife loves the look of the dress.
Je l aime.
